p: As it is predicted that large-scale viral diseases will occur more frequently in the future, there are voices that KM community need to discuss the role of KM as medicine and KMDs as healthcare professionals not to repeat the same situation. In this context, Korean Medicine Convergence Research Information Center (KMCRIC), a government-funded research information center for KM, organized an online panel discussion on the theme of “role of KM and its preparation in the post-COVID-19 era”. Through this discussion, a constructive and future-oriented direction for KM community to play a significant role in viral infectious diseases is expected to emerge. Below are summarized and edited presentations by the 6 panelists who are experts in respiratory medicine, cardiology and neurology, gastroenterology, and neuropsychiatry.
